mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_message (sender_id, sender_type, receiver_id, receiver_type, content, sent_at, chat_type) VALUES (#{senderId}, #{senderType}, #{receiverId}, #{receiverType}, #{content}, NOW(), #{chatType})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM chat_message WHERE ( (sender_id = #{senderId} AND receiver_id = #{receiverId}) OR (sender_id = #{receiverId} AND receiver_id = #{senderId}) ) ORDER BY sent_at ASC
